text: Maine unse uske siwa kuch nahin kaha jiska aapne hukum diya tha, yeh ke Allah ki bandagi karo jo mera Rubb bhi hai aur tumhara Rubb bhi, main usi waqt tak unka nigraan tha jab tak ke main unke darmiyan tha, jab aapne mujhey wapas bula liya to aap unpar nigraan thay aur aap to saari hi cheezon par nigraan hain
